title: Refutation Text-Based Simulation Learning to Improve Box Plot Interpretation Errors

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to interpret basic statistical graphs and understanding of box plot components
context.additional_context: A program for improving data literacy among learners in managerial/leadership roles within enterprises.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify over 80% of representative box plot errors (area misinterpretations) through counter-text-based simulations
After counter-text learning, learners achieve over 90% accuracy in box plot problem-solving simulations
Learners demonstrate analytical skills applicable to real-world operational data by analyzing VR-implemented box plot cases
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
